thread.title: Joanie

author: Joanie
title: Joanie
text: After taking TPC for 2 weeks now, I've noticed that my memory and my immune system has improved. You know how you open the refrigerator and say, "what am I looking for". That doesn't happen anymore. I'm also sleeping better. I used to wake up a couple of times during the night. Now, I sleep through the night and wake up just before my alarm goes off, and I feel rested and ready to start the day. I've been "burning the candle at both ends" for the past week, working with people that have colds. I haven't had a symptom yet. Although TPC is pricey, I'm going to continue taking it, because I'm seeing great results and for that alone, IT'S WORTH EVERY PENNY
